channel.title: Client crashing on all servers i try
channel.description: so i download any server on the top list.. and i log in and then as soon as i click to walk bam! the whole client just closes no warning messages no errors no nothing its happening on every client i download my msn is xfireftw@live.com if you can help me feel free to reply here or message me on MSN thx =).

item.title: Client crashing on all servers i try
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

Ok i heard alot of people try to run 317 Client’s on a windows 7 computer and when they walk around it crash’s this should help alot it works 100% for me

  1. Ok First you need to download this - http://uppit.com/v/REKLK274

2.Open that up and click Windows 7 Coverter

3.Then You will see a line that says ( Batch File: ) Click the ( … ) on that line then a brows will pop up and go to your client folder and click your .bat that you use to run your client.

4.Then push compile.

5.Now your done! go back to your client folder and if you have a windows 7 computer you can play 317’s now and it wont crash the client.
credits to locksmin, use the run.exe or application w/e it says, not the run.bat

Read full topic

item.title: Client crashing on all servers i try
item.dc:creator: @union221 union221
item.description:
@union221 wrote:

it didnt work i was able to play a bunch of servers today and ever since i reinstalled my java i cant play a client it has to be a webclient cus when i try to click to walk on the client it just closes i think its a java problem if anyone knows how to help me fix that =(

Read full topic
item.source: Client crashing on all servers i try

item.title: Client crashing on all servers i try
item.dc:creator: @db0wzz db0wzz
item.description:
@db0wzz wrote:

Is this 317 deob?

If it is, i may know problem.

Go into client, Right click the run.bat or runclient.bat, and if u see something similar to

@echo off
Java -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui
exit

Change the Java to
“C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe” (or w/e ur version is) (make sure it’s JDK tho <_< not jre)

Read full topic
